text: Even Jesus said a man has right to divorce is wife on the charges of adultery which means disrespecting her husband through infidelity justifies a divorce certificate from the man,and God said your husband shall be your head,so submission is a divine order for woman nt voluntary

Biblical teaching allows for divorce in the event of infidelity or abandonment. If a man is abusing his wife, has he not abdicated his role as a husband who ought love his wife as Christ loves the church? That feels like a kind of abandonment.
